instructions.title: Choose Your Character
instructions.description: Select from beloved anime characters like Nezuko Kamado, Usagi Tsukino, Zero Two, and Nami to style for the Met Gala.
instructions.tip: Each character has their own unique personality and style preferences!

instructions.title: Select Your Outfit
instructions.description: Browse through elegant kimonos, stunning evening gowns, and fashionable dresses to find the perfect look for your character.
instructions.tip: Mix traditional Japanese fashion with modern Met Gala glamour!

instructions.title: Apply Makeup
instructions.description: Create the perfect look with professional makeup tools - from natural beauty to dramatic Met Gala glamour.
instructions.tip: Experiment with different makeup styles to match your outfit!

instructions.title: Add Accessories
instructions.description: Complete your look with exquisite jewelry, hair accessories, and fashion-forward pieces for the perfect finishing touch.
instructions.tip: Accessories can transform a simple outfit into a stunning ensemble!

instructions.title: Showcase Your Style
instructions.description: Present your styled character on the red carpet and see your fashion creation come to life in a glamorous photo moment.
instructions.tip: Every transformation ends with a fashion-forward red carpet moment!

instructions.title: Create More Looks
instructions.description: Try different combinations and styles to create endless fashion possibilities. There's no competition - just pure creative fun!
instructions.tip: Express your unique style with endless combinations!
